job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAs part of the Wild Health Clarity Engineering team you will be actively involved in building both frontend or backend application features As part of a team with diverse skill sets you will have an opportunity to provide your own unique value while also learning from the senior and architectural mentors on the teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtA candidate will be expected to deliver quality software within spec within a timely manner defined within each sprint ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtEach member of the team should possess a willingness to contribute to an overall team goal by not only producing software for their individual tasks but also assisting teammates in order to move the entire product forwardltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltugtWhat You Will Enjoy about this RoleltugtltpgtltulgtltligtDelivering the engineering aspect of a professional software development process that starts from stakeholders and product ownersltligtltligtCollaborate with different teams to build software that not only operates for a specific vision but also fits within a more holistic purposeltligtltligtWork closely with product management when new features are being considered by being an advocate for not impacting the performance or quality of the existing productltligtltligtParticipate in technical discussions and communicate your ideas or vision to others Be challenged by discussing sophisticated problems open to debates and brainstormingsltligtltligtCollaborate with the engineering team to estimate and prioritize tasksltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltugtWhat You Bring To The RoleltugtltpgtltulgtltligtInterest in building scaling and operating sophisticated infrastructuresltligtltligtInterest in designing wellthought schemas building efficient clientservice layers and properly using various data structuresltligtltligtProficiency in C Net Core Python RxJSReact or NodejsltligtltligtAn ability to adapt to changing situations where new languages technologies or other features will be introducedltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltugtNice To HaveltugtltpgtltulgtltligtExperience with building RESTful APIs or GraphQL is a plusltligtltligtExperience with agile development processes working in a fastpaced environment with scheduled release planningltligtltligtExperience working with advanced Business Analytics tools like Looker Tableau or DOMOltligtltligtExperience scaling efficient relational database configurations and writing efficient SQL views stored procedures and functionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltugtAbout Wild Health  EngineeringltugtltpgtltpgtWild Health is about optimizing you We use genomics blood work biometrics micro biome assessment and a conversation with you to come up with a personalized comprehensive health planltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOur goal is to determine the perfect diet exercise and supplement plan for each individual patientltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis is done through an iterative process of evaluating thousands of published papers and building computer models to express those resultsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtClarity is the brand given to the software application that both patients and the Wild Health team use to facilitate this experience This is a mature ecosystem of various frontend applications backend applications databases event streaming services and other third party service integrationsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe team is more than a functional unit its a family Each member not only cares about the mission of delivering great software but also is invested in the personal growth of each other Our weekly processes reflect this mission Retrospective meetings held at the end of each sprint are designed to facilitate communication and care around improving everyone on the teamltpgt
